trans-unit.source: Indicates the required behavior when a virtual path is built.
trans-unit.target: 代表建立虛擬路徑時應採取的行為。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProviderResultFlags> values are used to indicate the results from the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider.GetResultFlags%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
The enumeration values indicate actions that are required after a virtual path is built within the ASP.NET build environment.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值表示 ASP.NET 建置環境中建立的虛擬路徑後所需的動作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProviderResultFlags> values are used by the ASP.NET build environment when using instances of the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider> class to build files and load the compiled assemblies.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProviderResultFlags>值由 ASP.NET 建置環境時使用的執行個體<xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider>類別來建置的檔案，並載入已編譯的組件。

trans-unit.source: The default value; no special action is required after compilation.
trans-unit.target: 預設值，表示編譯完成後不需要採取任何特殊行動。

trans-unit.source: The compilation of the virtual path requires the containing <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> to be unloaded and restarted.
trans-unit.target: 編譯虛擬路徑時，必須將所屬的 <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> 卸載並重新啟動。

trans-unit.source: This is only used in advanced compilation scenarios; typically, you should use the <see cref="F:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProviderResultFlags.Default" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 這種方式只有在比較進階的編譯過程中才會用到，通常都應該使用 <see cref="F:System.Web.Compilation.BuildProviderResultFlags.Default" /> 這個值。
